member.name: D3D11_FEATURE_DATA_SHADER_MIN_PRECISION_SUPPORT
member.summary: Note This structure is supported by the Direct3D 11.1 runtime, which is available on Windows 8 and later operating systems.Describes precision support options for shaders in the current graphics driver.

member.name: D3D11_FEATURE_DATA_SHADER_MIN_PRECISION_SUPPORT.PixelShaderMinPrecision
member.summary: A combination of -typed values that are combined by using a bitwise OR operation. The resulting value specifies minimum precision levels that the driver supports for the pixel shader. A value of zero indicates that the driver supports only full 32-bit precision for the pixel shader.

member.name: D3D11_FEATURE_DATA_SHADER_MIN_PRECISION_SUPPORT.AllOtherShaderStagesMinPrecision
member.summary: A combination of -typed values that are combined by using a bitwise OR operation. The resulting value specifies minimum precision levels that the driver supports for all other shader stages. A value of zero indicates that the driver supports only full 32-bit precision for all other shader stages.
